name: Word
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Text
Word
description:
Word

A word within a detected text (OCR). See Text.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision

image = vision.image "path/to/text.png"
text = image.text

words = text.words
words.count #=> 28

word = words.first
word.text #=> "Google"
word.bounds.count #=> 4
word.bounds.first #=> #<Vertex (x: 13, y: 8)>
